metadata.title: CVE-2018-16492 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A prototype pollution vulnerability was found in module extend <2.0.2,~<3.0.2 that allows an attacker to inject arbitrary properties ontoObject.prototype.

criterions.comment: node-extend: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
